name: Cube Count
description:
A simple little math practice game.

Practice numerical thinking and multiplication by finding the number of blocks in each structure.

Correct answers: 2 - 5 points, based on time taken

Wrong answers: -1 point

I might expand this game to include a world map and a variety of levels exploring different structures such as triangles, pyramids, and circles, with concepts such as fractions and estimation.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, feel free to leave a comment!
